entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is a house-elf who has been freed by her master, Mr. Crouch.

entities.name: mr crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is Winky's master and a judge in the Triwizard Tournament.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts who is talking to Winky.

entities.name: mr bagman
entities.description: Mr. Bagman is a judge in the Triwizard Tournament and works with Mr. Crouch.

relationships.description: Winky is the house-elf of Mr. Crouch.
Mr. Crouch and Mr. Bagman are judges in the Triwizard Tournament together.
